channel.title: Eric Boulianne on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Eric Boulianne on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Threesomes, S&M, Open Relationships and Love: Éric K. Boulianne’s ‘Follies’ Sexes up Locarno
item.description: The prolific Canadian screenwriter’s feature directorial debut, which also stars Catherine Chabot, just premiered at the Swiss festival and tests the thin line between comedy and drama.
